p.span: In consideration for the well-being of our employees, students, and families; as well as, out of an abundance of caution, Bessemer City Schools will be closed for students effective immediately. The school system will provide more information regarding possible feeding locations Monday.
All other employees are exempt from this expectation. Monday, April 6, 2020 will be the start of the Blending Learning Plan. Please stay abreast of new information.
Please continue to follow health recommendations from the Jefferson County Health Department.
